title: How to Tie a Tie (Windsor Knot)
steps: Drape the tie around your neck with the wide end on the right, about 12 inches lower than the narrow end.
Cross the wide end over the narrow end.
Bring the wide end up through the neck loop from underneath and down to the left.
Pull the wide end behind the knot to the right.
Bring the wide end up again through the neck loop from the front.
Pull it down through the front loop you've just created.
Tighten the knot and center it with both hands.
